During the character trial event "Aptitude Showcase," Trailblazers can use set teams that include trial characters to repeatedly experience specific stages.
Team Lineup, character levels, and the equipped Light Cones and Relics cannot be changed while experiencing the event stage.

◆ Event Rewards ◆
Rewards for the trial stage can be obtained from the event screen after completing the stage. Each trial stage reward may only be claimed once during the event.

Some poets warbled that a lady in a pastel-colored silk dress sauntered into the capital, and the empire collapsed in a cacophony. Other voices lamented that the metallic ring pricked his finger, and so the riotous machine killed the organic before him. -916759303:
◆ Introduction ◆
A brand-new expansion module: Herta and Screwllum have discovered an unobservable area within the Simulated Universe: Unknowable Domain! Unknown Curios, random Occurrences, and the Scepter system and Components left behind by Rubert II — could the fifth collaborator mentioned by these two geniuses be...?

◆ Gameplay Goal ◆
● Clear the Scattered Archives and Mundanite Assembly to complete the challenge

◆ Gameplay Rewards ◆
● Collect Scepters, Components, Occurrences, and Curios from the Simulated Universe: Unknowable Domain to earn collection rewards in the Bionic Records.
● Clearing each stage in the Scattered Archives for the first time will grant challenge rewards.
● Clearing each stage in the Mundanite Assembly for the first time will grant additional rewards.
● Story snippets collected during the stages can earn you extra rewards in Trailblaze Secrets.
● Completing the goals of specific Reorganized Models will earn corresponding rewards.

◆ Scattered Archives ◆
● Clearing stages in Scattered Archives unlocks new stages, with additional rewards granted for the first-time completion of these new stages. Starting from Stage 3 and beyond, you can access the Fourth Plane for further challenges.
● After clearing Stage 5, a Conundrum Level system will be added to the stage.
● When the Conundrum Level is used, the difficulty of Scattered Archives will significantly increase. Trailblazers can choose an appropriate Conundrum Level based on their abilities for the challenge.
● Higher Conundrum Levels can only be unlocked by clearing Stage 5 of Scattered Archives.
● Additional rewards can be earned for the first-time completion of each Conundrum Level.

◆ Mundanite Assembly ◆
● The Mundanite Assembly offers custom challenges for players to experience, with additional rewards granted upon first-time completion.
● After successfully completing a challenge in the Mundanite Assembly, you can review the recorded Build Content for reference when attempting other stages.
● Successfully completing challenges in the Mundanite Assembly will also unlock new story snippets.

◆ Arithmetic Mapping ◆
● In the Simulated Universe: Unknowable Domain, character levels, Light Cone levels, Traces, and Relics will be enhanced when the conditions are fulfilled. These enhancements are the same as in the Divergent Universe.
● When a character's level is below the level cap set by the current Equilibrium Level, it will be increased to that level cap.
● When a character's unlocked Traces are inactive, or if their Trace Level is lower than that required by the current Equilibrium Level, their Traces will be activated or their Trace Level will be increased to a level suitable for the current Equilibrium Level.
● When a character's equipped Relics' total Enhancement Level is lower than that required by the current Equilibrium Level, their Relics will be replaced with temporary Relics that are compatible with the current Equilibrium Level.

◆ Simulated Universe Points ◆
● Clear Scattered Archives and Mundanite Assembly to obtain weekly Simulated Universe Points.
-916755973:
◆ Introduction ◆
● Utilizing a certain cosmic e-commerce platform, Sampo has begun preparation for a new business venture on Belobog...

◆ Event Rules ◆
● During the event, Sampo will release 1 piece of e-commerce merchandise and a required component each day, totaling seven different merchandise items.
● Trailblazers can collect and submit the components to receive the daily e-commerce merchandise and rewards.

◆ Event Rewards ◆
● During the event, submit the required components and complete the mission to obtain Stellar Jades and Limited-Time Event rewards.

[Recording] "...This accident is actually a blessing in disguise, because I'm reunited with Lambda again. Actually, this is our fourth remarriage... and it's a bit embarrassing to say, but this is MY first proposal for a remarriage." Sourced from Bohdan.
-1025426640: [ID] EVD-X031JA12-004 [Name] Women's snow boots for polar expeditions [Key Feature] Displays evident signs of wear and repair, with a hidden disk in the sole. Possibilities of espionage have been preliminarily ruled out [Location] Klein's basement [Individual Involved] Klein (deceased), the best scientist in alloy material science and member No. #9 of the Genius Society. [Site Analysis] A huge number of items belonging to the late scientist Lambda were found in Klein's home, including the these boots. [Supplementary Testimony] "Maybe I was wrong about him... I mean, Klein. As for my late wife, Lambda... She's been away from me for a while, and I just feel... strange about her." Bohdan was unaware of the late Lambda's belongings in Klein's home but displayed no visible surprise upon discovery. [Additional Information] Klein's residence is located in a remote area with no visitors around the time of death as determined by the coroner. The preliminary diagnosis is accidental death. Bohdan, Lambda, and Klein shared a unique bond, and the series of "coincidences" they experienced border on the supernatural phenomena. [Recording] "I know you doubt me, Bohdan, and I can't prove my innocence to you. I'm sorry for Lambda, but I'm the last one who would ever do harm to her... In fact, I have a theory about the murderer's identity. Have you ever heard of the Lord of Silence?... *noise*" Sourced from the disk hidden in the boots.
-916755974:
◆ Introduction ◆
● A space station researcher has taken the initiative to take an IPC contract and send the commission to you. After confirming the researchers aren't trying to skim you for easy profits, you discover many people are actively trying to discover Boothill's whereabouts...

◆ Event Rules ◆
● When the event begins, <unbreak>24</unbreak> assignments will be released. Up to 4 assignments can be accepted by the Trailblazer at a time.
● Each assignment requires at least two characters to complete. Assignments will be given ratings in the following descending order: S, A, or B. Using recommended Paths or higher-level characters can increase the assignment's rating and earn bonus rewards.
● Event Assignments do not count toward the limit for the Regular Assignments, nor do they occupy characters from Regular Assignments. You can assign 1 Support Character provided by your friends to each Event Assignment.

◆ Event Rewards ◆
● During the event, assigning characters to commissions can obtain Stellar Jades and Limited-Time Event rewards.
540657294:
"...Birds are born with no shackles, then what fetters my fate♬?"

On the rehearsal day, the young family head hid himself among the seats for the audience, refraining from distracting the singer on the stage and maintaining the right distance, just as he had wished. He sat upright in his ceremonial garb as the solitary listener for that moment. Amidst the familiar melodies, his thoughts drifted back to his childhood, recalling occasions when she sang on stage, and he was her only audience.

"It's been so long since you sang with joy... I've built a stage for you, though it's... a bit rudimentary."

During the concert for the two of them, he vowed to fulfill her dream of gracing a grander, brighter stage someday.

"Let my heart bravely spread the wings. Soaring past the night. To trace the bright moonlight...♬"

He snapped out of his trance, considering the root of his reluctance to draw nearer to the stage — His ceremonial garb was not just for enjoying the performance, but also for the chance to withdraw at any moment he pleased.

"Congratulations, sister. We have both achieved our aspirations," he softly uttered.
540657296:
"As you command. I committed sins. I falsely claimed that various lineages were divided and exchanged this hearsay misinformation for payment..."

Through the partition, the family head caught the journalist's evasive gaze as the penitent nervously awaited his response — a ritual of confession he had done countless times when he granted absolution for those penitents like the bells of heaven. Subconsciously, he turned his head, trying to say something but stopping himself, his metal earrings emitting a crisp clash next to his ears.

"I'm fully aware that this claim is completely groundless. The truth is, through the grace of the Great One, all families stand united as one. This unity reflects the collective desire of all lineage members, who have devoutly embraced the Great One."

The penitent confessed his sins, resolved to amend his mistakes, and sought absolution from the harmonic tunes. The family head closed his eyes gently and uttered a sacred benediction.

"Very well. Show your sincerity to the other Family members and dispel those rumors. In this way, you shall be reinstated with Harmony. Now, please leave in peace."

What sin is there in speaking truth? His dictates were crystal clear but burdened like a yoke. He sighed and shook his head.

"...Next, please step forward."
-1025426646: [ID] EVD-X043FE21-001 [Name] Tweed jacket, coarse spun wool vest, and white shirt [Key Feature] Displays an 8-centimeter Phlogiston burn mark on the left chest [Location] Bohdan laboratory in the Energy Research Lab, Ohioti Central Academy of Sciences [Individual Involved] Bohdan (Deceased), the best scientist in the energy analysis field and member No.#7 of the Genius Society. [Site Analysis] The traces on the site indicate that the Grayseal Gold pellets carried by the subject absorbed a substantial amount of Phlogiston, resulting in a temperature spike of nearly 1,000 degrees Celsius near the subject's heart, leaving burn marks on the jacket, vest, and shirt. Half of an unburnt finger bone was found in the burnt area, identified as originating from Lambda or related to the high-purity Grayseal Gold pellets. [Supplementary Testimony] "...We should have been more caring about him, especially considering he never truly let go of his wife's death..." According to other scholars at the lab, Bohdan, who devised the safety manual specifications, should not have made such a careless mistake. [Additional Information] Grayseal Gold is a rare alloy developed by Klein, member No. #9 of the Genius Society, known for its ability to absorb and store Phlogiston. When a series of coincidences pile up, does that still count as a coincidence? [Relevant Document] "It is strictly forbidden to bring high-purity Grayseal Gold alloy products into laboratories with Phlogiston observation areas." Excerpted from the Energy Research Laboratory Safety Manual.
540657295:
"These visitors claimed to have urgent matters to report, esteemed head, but some of their identities remain questionable, and they used shady means to enter the Dreamscape..."

The uninvited guests trespassing the Dreamscape were lined up. Malefactors who inflicted harm faced banishment, and impostors were apprehended — all arrangements were made without a word spoken by him. The innocents, taken aback by his wrath, exchanged uneasy glances. However, he simply smiled, extending his hand in an inviting gesture, a symbol of acknowledgment and authority.

"As esteemed guests of the Oak Family, you shall be welcome wholeheartedly. Perhaps you wonder where my just judgments come from. Well, it's actually because your path has crossed with mine."

The attendants, the artists, and the jobless ones dispelled their doubts as they recognized the sincerity of his invitation.

"Let transgressors face harsh punishment, and let guests receive deserved honor. Such is the Law of Harmony."

The family head's sternness and generosity earned him the trust of his guests. Surveying the assembly, he bowed slowly...

"Welcome to the Oak family."
540657301:
"Go now. You are free — O chosen one, who dared to exceed his bounds. Sever your wings, descend to the mortal realm, and walk their lands. See what this world is truly like."

Since then, the IPC executive's words often echoed in his mind. He traversed bustling streets and quiet shores, always in motion yet rooted in place... He never doubted his own determination and capabilities, but before rising again, he intended to savor the hard touch when his ideals crashed to the ground...

"The fragmented stones, steeped in beast blood and human sweat, forever cold, rough, and unyielding..."

As the head of the Oak Family, he shepherded numerous lost souls onto the right path. Yet, when it concerned himself, those gentle reassurances seemed to lose their charm. He did not need rebuke, guidance, or sympathy.

"From the mire arise those who trudge and toil. I shall press forward, learning more from my stumbles than my triumphs."

Before embarking on his true journey, he granted himself enough time to reflect and rearrange his thoughts.

"Moving ahead has no intricate philosophy. If one path proves impassable, simply veer onto another."

649321437:
◆ Introduction ◆
● The grand music festival hides a lurking threat as the Dazzling Ninja Hero takes the stage — let the Sound Hunt begin once more! The band performance will soon commence, and it promises to be an electrifying spectacle!

◆ Event Rules ◆
● In the Sound Hunt Ninjutsu Inscription, Trailblazers will take on the role of the band manager for a music party, leading the members to complete three performances on the central stage of the campus. During preparations, Trailblazers must complete various music challenges to gather Inspiration for composing.
● Once you've gathered enough Inspiration and completed the composition, you can edit the track that will be performed and take the stage. The edited track will also continue to play in the central stage area of Paperfold University.

◆ Regular Rewards ◆
● Complete Easy or Hard music challenges to obtain Commemorative Badges.
● In Performance Remuneration, submit the Commemorative Badges to increase popularity and obtain rewards.

◆ Limited-time Rewards ◆
● During the limited-time event, complete the mission "Sound Hunt: Initiation" to obtain the Light Cone reward and collect musical inspirations to obtain Superimposition material rewards.
During the limited-time event, completing specified missions will earn you corresponding rewards.

◆ Event Reminders ◆
● After the Sound Hunt Ninjutsu Inscription limited-time event ends, Trailblazers will no longer be able to obtain the limited-time rewards, but they can still visit the Center Stage in the Penacony Paperfold University College map to experience and obtain regular rewards.

◆ Event Rules ◆
During the character trial event "Aptitude Showcase," Trailblazers can use set teams that include trial characters to repeatedly experience specific stages.
Team Lineup, character levels, and the equipped Light Cones and Relics cannot be changed while experiencing the event stage.

◆ Event Rewards ◆
Rewards for the trial stage can be obtained from the event screen after completing the stage. Each trial stage reward may only be claimed once during the event.

◆ Introduction ◆
Herta, Ruan Mei, Screwllum, and Stephen each conducted wild modifications to the Simulated Universe.

◆ Event Rules ◆
● After the event starts, a new plane will be unlocked daily, with a total of 5 planes.
● Each plane has different plane rules that help Trailblazers obtain more Blessings, Curios, and Cosmic Fragments to enhance their power.
● Each plane consists of an Ordinary Plane and a Manic Plane. After clearing the Ordinary Plane, you can enter the Manic Plane.
● The Manic Plane involves multiple consecutive battles with a 6-Cycle countdown. As the level increases, the number of enemies grows. You earn Manic Points based on the challenge level, and if you complete the challenge with cycles remaining, you'll gain extra Manic Points.
● After clearing the Ordinary Plane, data such as the characters, Blessings, Curios, and Cosmic Fragments used will be automatically saved. You can repeatedly challenge the Manic Plane to earn higher Manic Points.
● When the Trailblazer increases their Equilibrium Level, the levels of the enemies and trial characters in the event will also increase accordingly.

◆ Event Rewards ◆
During the event, by clearing the Ordinary Plane in each plane, challenging the Manic Plane, and earning the specified Manic Points, you can claim plane rewards in the "Limited-Time Rewards."
● After reaching the specified target for the highest accumulated Manic Points across all planes, you can claim the cumulative reward.

◆ Attention ◆
● Blessings, Curios, and Occurrences encountered within the plane will not unlock entries in the Simulated Universe index.
